summary: REQ-31 is not fully implemented. HeroSection was updated to point to a new image path, but it does not use a sanitized filename under `/assets/generated/`, and the diff shows no new static asset added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`. The existing `imageError` fallback behavior appears to be preserved.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the newly uploaded WhatsApp PNG to `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using a sanitized filename (no spaces/special characters) and reference it via `/assets/generated/<sanitized-filename>.png`.
missing_requirements.reason: No new file was added (diff shows Added: 0), and HeroSection references an unsanitized filename with spaces under `/assets/` rather than `/assets/generated/`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update `frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx` to use the new `/assets/generated/...` PNG path as the main hero photo, replacing `src="/assets/generated/cute-hero-photo-v2.dim_1600x2000.jpg"`.
missing_requirements.reason: The hero image path was changed, but not to `/assets/generated/<sanitized-filename>.png` as required; it now points to `/assets/WhatsApp Image 2026-02-11 at 7.14.23 AM.png`.

hallucinated_features.description: Hero image is loaded from `/assets/WhatsApp Image 2026-02-11 at 7.14.23 AM.png` (unsanitized filename with spaces) instead of a sanitized static asset under `/assets/generated/`.
hallucinated_features.reason: This directly conflicts with the constraint/requirement that all images be served as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and referenced via `/assets/generated/...`, and that the filename be sanitized.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to project metadata/summary files not requested by REQ-31 (e.g., `frontend-file-summaries.txt`, `project_state.json`).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to adding the image asset and updating HeroSectionâ€™s hero image path while preserving fallback; the diff shows additional modified files that are not part of that requirement.
